discussion.p: Just like stop_token (see LWG ), stop_source in declares an operator!= friend that is unnecessary in light of the new core language rules and should be struck.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4842.

li.p: Modify , class stop_source synopsis, as indicated:

blockquote.pre: [[nodiscard]] bool operator==(const stop_source& lhs, const stop_source& rhs) noexcept;

blockquote.p: -1- Returns: true if lhs and rhs have ownership of the same stop state or if both lhs and rhs do not have ownership of a stop state; otherwise false.

pre.del: [[nodiscard]] bool operator!=(const stop_source& lhs, const stop_source& rhs) noexcept;

blockquote.pre: friend void swap(stop_source& x, stop_source& y) noexcept;
